results.content: In my opinion there is no need to show how to install the services on so many operating systems.  Your  course should stick to one operating system, and show more details for that one Operating system.  This has been a huge waste of money, and I'm only using one operating system, not five of them.

results.content: Mohammed, thank you very much, the course was excellent and 100% straightforward, many things can improve but the masterscuba project was a wonderful plus, I have over 50 bought courses, I recommend this one.
